comment: I'll be leaving for surgery soon . I wanna back seat drive this thing so bad but I know they'll put me under . I've been reading everything I can about the operation and watching what videos I could find . Here We Go !

comment: I feel great , I'm an old opiate addict . It's been years since I had any . My surgery staff were angels , I'm so thankful . Maybe it'll hurt more tomorrow but it's ok .
